channel.title: Total Reality Delusion :: Digital Dilemma
channel.description: With thanks to Matt Westcott for JSSpeccy, an open-source ZX Spectrum emulator written in JavaScript Solution Walk Through by Dorothy Millard (C64 Version) (Start in a clearing in a strange wood), EXAMINE WOOD, N, N, EXAMINE TREES (dancing), DANCE (a slightly startled starling falls out of a tree), GET STARLING, EXAMINE STARLING, EXAMINE BLASTER (ghetto), UNPLUG BLASTER (the music stops and something pops out of the stereo), GET TAPE, EXAMINE TAPE, S, S, E (field), DIG (you dig a small hole), PLANT TAPE, FILL HOLE (a chainsaw pops up out of the ground!), GET SAW, EXAMINE SAW, START SAW (first you need safety equipment), EXAMINE SCARECROW, GET TROUSERS, EXAMINE TROUSERS, WEAR TROUSERS, W, S, S (well), EXAMINE WELL, EXAMINE ROPE, PULL ROPE (you find a bucket at the end), GET BUCKET, EXAMINE BUCKET (it has two holes in itâ€™s side), N, E, IN (shed), EXAMINE SHED, GET WOODLOUSE, EXAMINE WOODLOUSE (note the sharp teeth), TALK WOODLOUSE, OUT, W, N, W (dead end - an impenetrable wall of trees are west), WEAR BUCKET (makes a good helmet), START SAW (the trees lift their roots and hurry off), DROP SAW, DROP TROUSERS, DROP BUCKET.
